                                HttpResponse httpResponse)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Treats the HTTP request and defines the HTTP response
        Parameters:
        httpRequest - the HTTP request to treat
        httpResponse - the HTTP response to define
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an exception is raised during the treatment

                                                      java.lang.String queryString)
                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Executes a dynamic resource by creating a new process
        Parameters:
        resource - the dynamic resource
        queryString - teh query string to pass to the dynamic resource for it execution
        Returns:
        the result of the execution of the dynamic resource
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O exception is raised

      • checkResource

        public static void checkResource(java.lang.String resource)
                          throws HttpIllegalResourceException,
                                 HttpForbiddenException,
                                 HttpTeapotException
        Checks the resource of the HTTP request and raise an exception if the file is unavailable
        Parameters:
        resource - the targeted resource by the HTTP request
        Throws:
        HttpIllegalResourceException - if the resource is unavailable for legal reasons
        HttpForbiddenException - if the resource is forbidden
        HttpTeapotException - teapot easter egg

      • doResourceAction

        public static void doResourceAction(HttpRequest httpRequest,
                                    HttpResponse httpResponse,
                                    ResourceAction resourceAction,
                                    int successStatusCode)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Does a resource action among the list of ResourceAction available
        Parameters:
        httpRequest - the HTTP request
        httpResponse - the HTTP response to update
        resourceAction - the resource action to realize
        successStatusCode - the status code to set if the actions is realized successfully
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O exception is raised during creation an replace resource process
